=== Microwave Model ===
The 4 versions of this model are variations of the following:

http://graf-framework.googlecode.com/files/microwave.jpg

!MicrowaveWithInteger contains an action to increment the temperature, the others don't. !MicrowaveError and !MicrowaveExtended were just used for testing.

=== If Test ===

This model was used to test the teams implementation of if statements within GRAF
